customManagers.depNameTemplate: https://github.com/{{# if (equals depName 'folke') }}trouble.nvim{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'nvim-treesitter') }}nvim-treesitter{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'williamboman') }}mason.nvim{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'williamboman') }}mason-lspconfig.nvim{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'neovim') }}nvim-lspconfig{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'mrcjkb') }}rustaceanvim{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'github') }}copilot.vim{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'lazy.nvim') }}folke{{/if}}/{{depName}}
customManagers.currentValueTemplate: {{# if (equals depName 'folke') }}main{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'nvim-treesitter') }}master{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'williamboman') }}main{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'williamboman') }}main{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'neovim') }}main{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'mrcjkb') }}main{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'github') }}main{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'lazy.nvim') }}main{{/if}}
